QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hammer toe repair ?
QAPair.Answer: A hammer toe is a toe that stays in a curled or flexed position. This can occur in more than one toe. This condition is caused by: Muscle imbalance, Rheumatoid arthritis, Shoes that do not fit well,
